title: fennic
author: fennic
content: Hi guys I know some of users will say that what am I doing. I was saying that if you know about https://bitsler.comI wanted to ask because in prior 2017 and 2018 I deposited almost 300 dollars and I lost in a single day by playing dice. And I do not know what is Dice at that time. And laster I deposited more and more. There was time when I made almost 2 Ethereum and they worth Upto 800 dollars at a peak time of Ethereum. So after I also lost everything. That's why I try to avoid gambling. What are your scenes. Have anyone made some fortune through betting.

comments.author: Apocollapse
comments.body: When I read the subject title, I think you're want to discuss about: What is bitsler, bistler is scam me, anyone experience on bitsler, etc.But when I read the post, you're actually discuss about: how much is your biggest winning?Lol, it's better if you change your subject title rather than confuse anyone here.Well I ever deposit for $50 when I play slots and then I only have $5 left, but when I try to bet with $5 I get huge multipliers and I got a lot profit.

comments.author: Don Pedro Dinero
comments.body: Quote from: fennic on December 22, 2022, 12:32:01 AM Have anyone made some fortune through betting. A gambling fortune can only be made in two ways:1) By getting lucky in games such as the lottery or games like slots with very high prizes.2) By betting professionally on games such as poker or sports betting, but it requires a lot of study, effort and dedication.Going to the casino and betting a few dollars on roulette, slots, etc. is not going to make you rich. Quote from: Apocollapse on December 22, 2022, 03:39:16 AMBut when I read the post, you're actually discuss about: how much is your biggest winning?Lol, it's better if you change your subject title rather than confuse anyone here.Yes, OP, it's better to change the title.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: The first thing you have to remember is, don't make gambling your place to make money, only make it a place for you to find entertainment. And since it's only for entertainment purposes, you should limit your deposit amount. I personally don't know about Bitsler and have never made a deposit there either, I only play on 2 sites ATM, they're Rollbit and Stake. Apart from that, I haven't played the original games either, except X-Roulette on Rollbit and Slide on Stake.About the gambling experience, my best experience was when I got max win at Gates of Olympus while playing at Rollbit.Quote from: MAAManda on August 14, 2022, 01:26:24 AMAfter some time playing Gates of Olympus on Rollbit, I finally got my first Max Win on Gates of Olympus on Rollbit. Still didn't expect to get this Max Win at the beginning of the game, usually I get Max Win after playing for a very long time. And as usual, withdrawals are very fast, Thanks Rollbit Replay: https://replay.pragmaticplay.net/w57gWFU8oc

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: What is your question? The title is 'have anyone heard Bitsler.com'? But you ended your topic post with 'have anyone made some fortune through betting'? You question later has nothing to do with a betting site called Bitsler.Better to change your topic title to something like 'have you made good fortune from gambling'.Know that gambling is a way you can make profit or loss, but the probability of losing is far higher. Just gamble for fun and not a means of making money for you not to get addicted or using high amount of money because to lose is more centain than to win.

comments.author: Wexnident
comments.body: To answer the title, yes, I've heard of bitsler, I reckon most of us here have. To answer the other question, no, I'd only ever consider a "fortune through betting" to be something life-changing, anything less than that is just a pretty standard experience, probably enough to break even from all the bets you've made in your entire gambling experience. "Losing everything" may be something rare or something to be pitied, but when it comes to gambling it's actually somewhat of a normal occurrence, though may vary depending on what "everything" means but in this case it's mostly on your bankrolls per session anw.

comments.author: mindrust
comments.body: Quote from: Apocollapse on December 22, 2022, 03:39:16 AMWhen I read the subject title, I think you're want to discuss about: What is bitsler, bistler is scam me, anyone experience on bitsler, etc.But when I read the post, you're actually discuss about: how much is your biggest winning?Lol, it's better if you change your subject title rather than confuse anyone here.Well I ever deposit for $50 when I play slots and then I only have $5 left, but when I try to bet with $5 I get huge multipliers and I got a lot profit.He is probably a hired shill by bitsler. Just because somebody don't wear a signature doesn't mean that he can't be a shill for a casino. Maybe he is a bitsler employee... Everybody can create an account in this forum in the end.-Yes, every who reads this forum already knows about bitsler.com I believe. They are not a new casino. They have been around forever. (7 years)

comments.body: Quote from: fennic on December 22, 2022, 12:32:01 AMHi guys I know some of users will say that what am I doing. I was saying that if you know about https://bitsler.comI wanted to ask because in prior 2017 and 2018 I deposited almost 300 dollars and I lost in a single day by playing dice. And I do not know what is Dice at that time. And laster I deposited more and more. There was time when I made almost 2 Ethereum and they worth Upto 800 dollars at a peak time of Ethereum. So after I also lost everything. That's why I try to avoid gambling. What are your scenes. Have anyone made some fortune through betting. you want to promote the bitsler casino site or share your experience playing dice games at the casino, I know this casino used to be famous because it did a lot of promotions and campaigns but I don't see it anymore it's like it's faded and I've never played there, the casino doesn't have too many gamblers active again as far as I know, I only play dice at the casino Stake wins or loses it all depends on how wise we are in betting let alone using strategy of course luck is needed when gambling

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: I know bitsler.com and maybe it's in the same generation as fortunejack, crypto.games, freebitco.in (if I am not mistaken) because bistler has been operating for a long time. But I don't know how the site is now because I didn't hear from them and didn't follow their ANN.If you don't know what Dice is, why are you playing it, especially if you are using $300 and it doesn't make sense to gamble on a game you don't know.Some people make money through betting and are more professional than others. They can manage the use of money and time and choose gambling games they are good at. That means they can really make money and that's why they are professional gamblers.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: fennic on December 22, 2022, 12:32:01 AMHi guys I know some of users will say that what am I doing. I was saying that if you know about https://bitsler.comI wanted to ask because in prior 2017 and 2018 I deposited almost 300 dollars and I lost in a single day by playing dice. And I do not know what is Dice at that time. That's the worse way to lose in gambling playing a game that you don't know how to play, it's not good but hopefully, you enjoy learning while losing, $300 is a big amount next time if you encounter a new game, play the minimum like $10 to get acquainted with the game.Quote.... So after I also lost everything. That's why I try to avoid gambling. You're not the one, many gamblers avoid gambling the first time they lose but they always come back, because the memory of enjoying and the excitement of the game pulls them backQuoteWhat are your scenes. Have anyone made some fortune through betting. There are those who made fortunes but compared to the number of those losing big money you will be shocked by the number, the casinos are the ones winning compared to the number of gamblers who won against the casino.

comments.author: Kelvinid
comments.body: Bitsler is an old gambling site and one of the most popular before. I don't know about their status now because I have not been playing with this site anymore since they restricted my account for the KYC requirement. Back in the day, everything was okay, most gambling sites does not require a KYC but now you really need to choose carefully so your money is safe.

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: Quote from: fennic on December 22, 2022, 12:32:01 AMHi guys I know some of users will say that what am I doing. I was saying that if you know about https://bitsler.comI wanted to ask because in prior 2017 and 2018 I deposited almost 300 dollars and I lost in a single day by playing dice. And I do not know what is Dice at that time. And laster I deposited more and more. There was time when I made almost 2 Ethereum and they worth Upto 800 dollars at a peak time of Ethereum. So after I also lost everything. That's why I try to avoid gambling. What are your scenes. Have anyone made some fortune through betting. Isn't this normal? I think you're not the only one that made some mistake in the past by gambling it rather than holding the actual Ethereum but it's too late for regrets. We may never know if Ethereum will last but gambling it instead was the riskier thing you've done but it's always on you/us, if it's the other way around and you're winning that could have been a different story.

comments.author: Eternad
comments.body: Quote from: fennic on December 22, 2022, 12:32:01 AMHave anyone made some fortune through betting. You will have a hard time getting a feedback from this type of user because they are probably not active here if they already won a fortune in betting. There are some whales that still here but there profit can’t be considered as fortune since it’s just x2 or x3 of there normal huge bet which I believe not huge enough for them.Bitsler is well know in this forum since they are one of the biggest dice casino before that rival primedice and Bitsler. I remember I manage to win almost 2BTC in there but during Bitcoin price is 2K USD which will be worth a fortune if I didn’t sold.

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: fennic on December 22, 2022, 12:32:01 AMHi guys I know some of users will say that what am I doing. I was saying that if you know about https://bitsler.comI wanted to ask because in prior 2017 and 2018 I deposited almost 300 dollars and I lost in a single day by playing dice. And I do not know what is Dice at that time. And laster I deposited more and more. There was time when I made almost 2 Ethereum and they worth Upto 800 dollars at a peak time of Ethereum. So after I also lost everything. That's why I try to avoid gambling. What are your scenes. Have anyone made some fortune through betting. Gambling is entertaining, the rewards are sometimes big, and it's not a lot of work. But if you are really trying to avoid gambling completely, I suggest you stay away from Gambling discussions as well. The more you are exposed to the idea of gambling, the more likely you are to start thinking about it. And it can be hard to stop once you've started. So if you're trying to avoid gambling completely, you need to stay away from any conversation that has anything to do with it.In the end, gambling is a risk. It might work out, it might not. There are some who can be successful with it, and there are others who can't. My belief is that moderation is the only way to play these types of games. Focus on what's important in your life instead of chasing an illusion.

comments.author: darkangel11
comments.body: Don't even start with me about how much a coin used to be worth and how much it is now. I used to gamble when bitcoin was worth less than 1k USD and I could easily gamble away $100 a week which today would be something like $1.8k. Yes, OP, this is normal. Sometimes you lose money, sometimes you lose an opportunity to make money and sometimes both. Life is hard The thread reads like an ad for Bitsler, but once you read OP's post it becomes more of a warning

It is unlikely that the one who made a fortune on gambling is on this forum, because I think he has nothing to prove here, and in order to play big, you need silence and a lot of free time. For example, I'm not a big fan of gambling and probably the biggest thing I've won is something around $500.

comments.author: maydna
comments.body: Some time ago, I had my winnings placing a sports bet on the World Cup, and while it wasn't huge, it was a nice win for me. I know Bitsler, but I can't remember if I've been there or just heard the name because it was so long ago. I also don't know whether Bitsler is still operating until now or is it no longer operating.Everyone must have experienced loss, but perhaps some people haven't won. But many of us have gambled using so much money that we have suffered big losses. But some manage to win a lot of money and enjoy the winning money.

comments.author: btc_angela
comments.body: Quote from: fennic on December 22, 2022, 12:32:01 AMHi guys I know some of users will say that what am I doing. I was saying that if you know about https://bitsler.comIt has been in the crypto based online games for many years, and I remember them running a signature campaign here as well.Quote from: fennic on December 22, 2022, 12:32:01 AMI wanted to ask because in prior 2017 and 2018 I deposited almost 300 dollars and I lost in a single day by playing dice. And I do not know what is Dice at that time. And laster I deposited more and more. There was time when I made almost 2 Ethereum and they worth Upto 800 dollars at a peak time of Ethereum. So after I also lost everything. That's why I try to avoid gambling. What are your scenes. Have anyone made some fortune through betting. That was a long time ago mate, not sure if you were able to avoid gambling for that long, or maybe you have lessen your gambling activity. I guess everyone has went to what you experience, lost huge amount of money to any crypto based platform. Nevertheless, we could be getting back into gambling learn from our experience and maybe try to control ourselves not to lose big money and just enjoy it, just saying.

Is this about Bitsler or you are ranting about losing money from gambling, you lose 300 dollars four years ago but you cannot get over it, and still remember everything you should not cry over spilled milk and try to change your mindset on what gambling is if you're still playing in a casino, moderate your bet and your time until you have control on your urge to gamble, that's where the fun starts when you have control on your urge to gamble and your money.

Well, you do but I guess you don't have to associate the discussion on their name.What you've experienced is just a typical day of a gambler. We win some and lose a lot, we just can't skip experiences like this because that's how it really should go.We think that it's best to avoid to gamble but later on, we'll still be back.
